item.title: 南非计划调整场外衍生品市场以遏制风险
item.description: 南非金融监管机构正在制定场外衍生品市场的新规则，要求某些产品必须由中央交易对手进行清算，以提高透明度和降低风险。【原文：South Africa’s financial watchdog is preparing new rules for the over-the-counter derivatives market that will require certain products to be cleared by a central counterparty to improve transparency and reduce risk.】

item.title: Orsted 将继续出售股份以避免危机
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府下令停止一个几乎完工的海上风电场的建设后，Orsted A/S表示将继续执行出售股票的计划，以控制日益严重的危机。【原文：Orsted A/S said it will continue with plans to sell shares as it tries to contain a growing crisis that worsened after President Donald Trump’s administration ordered construction to halt on an almost-finished offshore wind farm.】

item.title: 阿布扎比马斯达尔公司为屋顶太阳能公司股权寻找买家
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的可再生能源公司正在洽谈出售其持有的屋顶太阳能公司 Emerge Energy 50% 的股份，因为该公司希望将资源集中用于更大的项目。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s biggest renewables company is in talks to sell its 50% stake in rooftop solar firm Emerge Energy, as it looks to focus its resources on bigger projects.】

item.title: 中国政府收紧政策后中国稀土企业反弹
item.description: 中国稀土生产商周一大涨，此前中国政府制定了对稀土行业实施更严格管控的计划，而稀土行业在中国与美国的贸易战中发挥了至关重要的作用。【原文：China’s rare earths producers surged on Monday, after the government fleshed out plans for stricter controls on an industry that has played a crucial role in the country’s trade war with the US.】

item.title: 印度央行行长称印度央行并未 "忽视 "经济增长
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）周一表示，尽管稳定物价仍是印度央行的首要任务，但印度央行并未 "忽视 "其增长目标。【原文：India’s central bank has not “lost sight” of its growth objective, even as price stability remains its primary mandate, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said on Monday.】

item.title: 据说保诚对瀚亚投资 30 亿美元的审查陷入僵局
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，保诚集团（Prudential Plc）对瀚亚投资公司（Eastspring Investments）的审查，包括可能出售股份或为该资产管理公司建立合伙关系，由于对估值和交易结构的担忧而停滞不前。【原文：Prudential Plc’s review of Eastspring Investments, which included possibly selling a stake or forming a partnership for the asset manager, has stalled amid concerns over valuation and deal structure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 需求强劲，产量减少，玉米升至本月最高点
item.description: 芝加哥玉米跃升至一个月来的最高点，原因是强劲的需求和低于预期的产量前景继续支撑着价格。【原文：Chicago corn jumped to the highest in a month as strong demand and a lower-than-expected production outlook continued to support prices.】

item.title: 印尼在买家反对下废除煤炭定价规则
item.description: 在买家反对今年早些时候推出的一项制度后，印尼废除了迫使矿商按政府确定的水平出售煤炭和矿物的规定。【原文：Indonesia scrapped rules forcing miners to sell coal and minerals at government-determined levels after buyers pushed back against a system introduced earlier this year.】

item.title: 布伦特对中东石油标价出现罕见贴水
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）严厉打击俄罗斯的原油产量，并且预计今年晚些时候将出现原油供应过剩，全球原油基准布伦特原油的交易价格罕见地低于中东原油。【原文：Brent, the global crude oil benchmark, is trading at a rare discount to its Middle Eastern counterpart, as President Donald Trump cracks down on Russian barrels and a glut is forecast for later in the year.】

item.title: 发行商关注利差收窄和美联储的暗示，亚洲债券谈判升温
item.description: 在对美国进一步降息的预期日益增强之际，一些亚洲借款人本周开始与投资者就美元债券交易进行谈判，旨在锁定一些数十年来最窄的信贷息差。【原文：Several Asian borrowers are opening talks with investors this week on dollar bond deals, aiming to lock in some of the tightest credit spreads seen in decades amid growing expectations for further US interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率降至四个月低点
item.description: 新加坡 7 月份的主要通胀指标降温，增幅为四个月来最慢。【原文：Singapore’s key inflation gauge in July cooled to the slowest pace of gains in four months.】

item.title: 中国加大房地产支持力度，上海放宽购房规定
item.description: 中国金融中心上海放宽了购房规定，这是当局遏制中国长期房地产危机的最新尝试。【原文：China’s financial hub of Shanghai eased home-buying rules in the latest attempt by authorities to contain the nation’s prolonged property crisis.】

item.title: Gamuda 与 Gentari 合作开发 1.5 千兆瓦太阳能项目
item.description: 基础设施公司Gamuda Bhd.和清洁能源公司Gentari Sdn.将联合开发约1.5千兆瓦的可再生能源容量，以满足马来西亚超大规模数据中心的电力需求。【原文：Infrastructure firm Gamuda Bhd. and clean energy company Gentari Sdn. will jointly develop approximately 1.5 gigawatts of renewable energy capacity as they seek to meet power demand for hyperscale data centers in Malaysia.】

item.title: 随着野味消费增长，尼日利亚医生担心疫情爆发
item.description:
从蝙蝠到大象，吃这些东西曾经主要是一种农村现象，现在在城市也越来越流行。【原文：

Once largely a rural phenomenon, eating everything from bats to elephants is increasingly popular in cities too.

item.title: 债券承压，中国加大长期现金刺激力度
item.description: 中国加大了向其金融体系注入长期流动性的力度，此举很可能是为了缓解债券抛售，并确保疲弱的经济有充足的资金。【原文：China dialed up its injection of longer term liquidity into its financial system in a move that’s likely intended at easing the selloff in bonds and ensuring adequate funding for the flailing economy.】

item.title: 鲍威尔上台后，中国人民银行人民币汇率定值创 1 月以来最大升幅
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在杰克逊霍尔发表评论后，美元汇率下滑，中国加强了人民币定值，幅度为 1 月以来最大。【原文：China strengthened its yuan fixing by the most since January after the dollar slumped in the wake of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s commentary at Jackson Hole.】

item.title: 李在镕与特朗普首次会晤的五大看点
item.description: 周一，韩国总统李在明将在白宫与唐纳德-特朗普首次会晤，这位亚洲领导人将面临上任不到三个月以来的最大考验。【原文：When South Korean President Lee Jae Myung meets with Donald Trump at the White House for the first time on Monday, the Asian leader will face his biggest test since taking office less than three months ago.】

item.title: 特朗普因新闻报道问题威胁美国全国广播公司（NBC）和美国广播公司（ABC）执照
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普斥责美国全国广播公司（NBC）和美国广播公司（ABC）是 "历史上最糟糕、最有偏见的两家电视台"，并表示他将支持联邦通信委员会吊销这两家电视台的许可证。【原文：US President Donald Trump berated NBC and ABC as “two of the worst and most biased networks in history,” adding he’d support the FCC in revoking licenses to their television stations.】

item.title: 中国芯片 ETF 溢价飙升，显示市场热情高涨
item.description: 中国投资芯片股的交易所交易基金的溢价率正在飙升，这表明市场的某些角落正弥漫着兴奋的情绪。【原文：China’s exchange-traded funds that invest in chip stocks are seeing a surge in their premiums, a sign of euphoria building in some corners of the market.】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂在关键的大选审查前评分飙升
item.description: 日本首相石破茂的支持率在当地媒体的民意调查中急剧上升，因为上个月的选举结果将决定他作为领导人的未来。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s approval ratings surged in local media polls ahead of a verdict on last month’s election performance that could determine his future as leader.】

item.title: 利润增长，中国金风科技股价创四年来最大涨幅
item.description: 中国金风科技股份有限公司是全球最大的风力涡轮机制造商，由于强劲的国内需求推动了其利润增长，该公司股价创下四年来最大涨幅。【原文：China’s Goldwind Science & Technology Co., the world’s largest wind-turbine maker, saw shares jump the most in four years as strong domestic demand boosted its profits.】

item.title: 鸽派鲍威尔发出美联储降息信号后工业金属上涨
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）研讨会上发表讲话，表示央行可能在下个月降息，随后工业金属和铁矿石上涨。【原文：Industrial metals and iron ore rose after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s speech at the Jackson Hole symposium, where he signaled the central bank would likely cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 贝莱德暂停为最新亚洲私人信贷基金募资
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，贝莱德公司今年早些时候暂停了其最新亚洲私人信贷策略的筹款活动，原因是该公司与 HPS Investment Partners 合并，这为该公司在该地区发展该资产类别的雄心增添了不确定性。【原文：BlackRock Inc. paused fundraising earlier this year for its latest Asian private credit strategy amid its merger with HPS Investment Partners, people familiar with the matter said, adding to uncertainties for the firm’s ambitions for the asset class in the region.】

item.title: 财政忧虑再现，印度债券涨势骤减
item.description: 两个月前，在印度的债券市场上很难发现熊市。现在，投资者的情绪发生了转变，他们要求更高的回报来持有印度的债券。【原文：Two months ago, it was hard to spot a bear in India’s bond market. Now, sentiment has flipped, with investors demanding higher returns to hold the nation’s debt.】
